website_summaries.verdict: Multipurpose storage shelf can be used as a basketball rack and so much more.
pros: Shelves can hold four basketballs each, but the pockets are deep enough that more can be squeezed in if needed
Less than eight pounds, making it easy to move around
Smaller pockets provide a place to store all of your sports equipment
cons: This unit does not have wheels, so it's not possible to roll on and off a court

customer_reviews.title: Disc Golf Storage/3 tier storage shelf
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother for Christmas to store his excessive amount of disc golf discs and so far, he loves it and it works great! I really wasn't sure how this would work for this purpose and I had seen other reviews not recommending it for that, but if anyone else is looking at using this for disc golf storage, it has been perfect for it so far! It is mostly filled and have had no trouble with the durability of the canvas holders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garage solution
customer_reviews.text: Instructions make it hard to know which side of canvas faces up or down and the stickers marking them which way fall off. It doesn't stretch right if you put it on one way however. Would have been a snap to assemble otherwise. It is great for organizing the garage, but wish my son and his friends would remember to put the many sports things away. It holds quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C.

customer_reviews.title: So useful and dimensions in product description are accurate
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 1 bedroom apartment and scrolled through SO many shelving units to find something for my random exercise gear. I needed something not too big to throw exercise stuff into so it wasn't all over the floor -- yoga mat, exercise bands, foam roller, balance disc, rock climbing shoes, jump ropes, and a few other misc items. It all fits easily. I really like that I chose something like this instead of hard shelves since the 'baskets' hold more and something like a foam roller won't roll right off.
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: A good organizer for my basement
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and allows me to get items off the floor in my basement (not a finished basement). It can lose balance easily depending upon what you put in it. It comes with stabilization straps that I recommend. Overall, it is good for organizing things when shelving is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed this on a whim after I was tripping over my kids sport balls in the garage. It took about 15 minutes to put together and I put it in the garage and filled it up. Works great and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with final product
customer_reviews.text: The cloth buckets are very thick and durable and once assembled the bars are sturdy as well.... as long as children aren’t doing things like crawling inside or laying it across the top lol I’m happy to have something easier for them to find their items than one big bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Wanted to use it outside for basketballs, etc. Canvas already ripped. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hales C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: Had this assembled in less than 5 minutes. Esthetically it fits about 10 balls but my kids have managed to squeezed about 15 into it and the fabric has not torn or anything yet. It free stands without issues and fits nicely just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this organizer so much I ordered a second one
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer so much I ordered a second one. We have a shelf for an assortment of balls we have collected, a shelf for nerf guns, a shelf for bike helmets and so on. The kids can easily find their toys and then put them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Capacity
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality. Quick easy assembly. Built very sturdy. It can hold a lot of balls - basketballs, soccer balls, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for garage toys
customer_reviews.text: Put this in our garage for the kids to keep their toys in. Our 1 and 4 year old can both reach the shelves. It won’t take a beating but does the trick for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frisbees
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for frisbee golf disks. Very sturdy. This will last a long time. Perfect size for them as well, but also holds ultrastar disks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike1966

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Great for giving the kids an easy way to access the balls and put them back where they belong. No excuses lol.
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: Get organized!
customer_reviews.text: Helped us organize our family sports gear. Very easy to put together (less than 10 min). Just wish their was a way to organize our shorter height sports gear for my 4 year old's sports stuff. But works great for my older kids. They should consider having organizing pockets on the outside of the utility stand too. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LuluLoves

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I thought it would be heavier duty. If it wasn’t such a hassle to return, I’d do so. I think $25-30 is a more appropriate price. It’s super light and tips back and forth (all four feet don’t touch the ground at the same time). It’s yet to be determined if it will hold up well to the light use we plan for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Garage never looked better.
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you have boys. Garage is kept clean as my actual children put their own stuff back in the bin. Very child accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Salad252

customer_reviews.title: ... toys in the garage so that it would be easy for the kids to grab as they go out ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to organize the soccer tennis footballs and yard toys in the garage so that it would be easy for the kids to grab as they go out to play in the yard this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as you would expect. It took the clutter of 2 bins of ball inside to a nice little stack on porch. Only down side is the vertical height between tiers could be a bit more. A little difficult for kids to get ball in/out when the spots above it are already filled.
customer_reviews.author: christina tiley

customer_reviews.title: Garage never looked better.
customer_reviews.text: Smarten up and get these for your garage. Keeps all my boys sports stuff in one place. Greatest thing is the my sons actually put their stuff back in the rack and not me. Simple for them to access.
customer_reviews.author: Salad252

customer_reviews.title: Great to organize sports equipment/balls
customer_reviews.text: Great to store all the balls in the garage. Low enough that my 3 and 7 year old sons can easily reach in and out of it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rack was very easy to step up
customer_reviews.text: Rack was very easy to step up. All of my workout equipment fit perfectly. It also came in a timely manner. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to store exercise equipment suck as ropes and bands
customer_reviews.author: RockstarG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and great for storing balls and sports equipment!
customer_reviews.author: LG22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Holds a lot of basketballs and nice design.
customer_reviews.author: LG22

customer_reviews.title: Solved my sports clutter problem
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to get the clutter of basketballs, sport bags and Frisbees off the floor. It assembled easily and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is a good size, and would have gotten 5 stars from ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is a good size, and would have gotten 5 stars from me, but is missing a screw and pole separator. 😠
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works but not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A little unsteady but it holds up fine. Just seems to sway a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: We use it to hold balls for a children's camp. Fits plenty of balls and other things!

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Holes don’t line up. Can’t assemble
customer_reviews.text: The holes totally don’t line up. I cant assemble it due to poor manufacturing. This is total junk and I’ve missed the return period
customer_reviews.author: lin-shao chin

customer_reviews.title: Price a bit high for the quality
customer_reviews.text: The product seems ok, not great for the price. Unfortunately mine arrived missing a few parts so I'm waiting for a replacement. Part most likely to fail is the fabric, which appears sturdy but won't know for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Jost

customer_reviews.title: Love the product - easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love the product - easy to put together. My only suggestion would be a wheel kit so you can move it around once it's full. Arrived faster than expected!
customer_reviews.author: amtolman

customer_reviews.title: Helped me organize the garage.
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of balls. Easy to assemble and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Love it but cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and function but come cracked on the bottom and I only noticed after I put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, works well for storage for all my boys balls/ toys in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: DDKap

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my garage and it works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large, spacious and solid construction. Holds all my sports equipment and I have a lot of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organize
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item. I like to keep things organized and this is perfect for my garage
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together. I have no idea how you would stack them with other units though, and that is shown in the photos on the boxes as an option. Holds a lot of gear (we used it for balls and toys in the garage so the kids can always find their stuff). Not quite as sturdy as I'd hoped for, but it's not flimsy either. It'll do just fine holding what it's supposed to hold, so as long as my kids don't decide to climb it or something!
customer_reviews.author: C. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for garage to store my boys' basketballs, footballs, soccer balls. Will be ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: TCE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the wire on top not the best and should have a hinge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces of legs
customer_reviews.text: Does not have all the parts on legs need to return
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for storage and organization
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for storage and organization!! Love the small section also. Doesn't take up much room and holds a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: like a shoe rack and more:)
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect and seems sturdy for kids shoes n sports equip.
customer_reviews.author: NICK M

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and it holds a lot I just ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and it holds a lot I just hope it holds up like I hope it does
customer_reviews.author: Responsible4lotsofkids

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit toddler toys well...
customer_reviews.text: Don't love this as much as their other storage units. I was hoping to store my kids baseball bats and toy golf clubs and various racquets in there - it's just not the right depth for any of those.
customer_reviews.author: DDKap

customer_reviews.title: not worth 50$ but good idea
customer_reviews.text: great idea. cheaply made. for 50$ i was pissed. this is worth maybe 25$... the first one amazon shipped me was cracked all along the bottom plastic leg. the box was damaged to the point if i worked there i wouldnt have even sent it to a customer. but that box was inside an ordinary box so i know it wasnt from fedex. got second one mailed with no issues. its functional. holds my extra discs golf discs and my sons sports equipment as shown
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Q

customer_reviews.title: Made garage clean up SO nice! Relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Made garage clean up SO nice! Relatively easy to put together. Lightweight, but sturdy when assembled. Didn't look large enough, but holds everything we needed it to. Bought two of them! That's 3basketballs, 3 soccer balls, 2 footballs, a helmet +more in one and all of our nerf guns and swords in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C.

customer_reviews.title: Also great for stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.text: I happened across this while looking for something to store/organize my kids stuffed animals. It worked just as I hoped! I fit a ton of animals in it. The gray fabric is a real nice shade and the material is strong. The frame is also real nice and sturdy. Easy to put together. Super happy with this purchase. (I painted the metal legs only because I wanted to match the color scheme of her room)
customer_reviews.author: ServetaLu

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described - more than 12 Sections
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizational item but it was not as described. The item had more than "12 sections" to place items. Please see attached photo for reference. This unfortunately doesn't allow wider items (like tennis rackets) to be stored as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this for adult sizes sports balls
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this for adult sizes sports balls. The weight of the balls weighs down the fabric and you can't easily get the balls out of the row underneath because the balls in the row above are touching the tops of the balls underneath. Spend a little more and get the metal ball rack.
customer_reviews.author: TJHTC

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We had so many basketballs / soccer balls / footballs etc in our garage that I was going crazy! This rounded them all up in one convenient bin space and was SO easy to put together! I just got it, so I can't really speak to the overall quality / sturdiness over the test of time.....but it seems well made and like it will last. I am ordering the 3 shelf one right now to keep all of our other garage toys together!
customer_reviews.author: lbryan

customer_reviews.title: Good storage but maybe not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and is sturdier than I thought it would be. Fabric feels heavy duty. Keeps all my sons balls organized. Updated review: after 2 weeks the fabric has ripped on the side....it is disappointing because we have had it for such a short time and it holds mostly kids balls that are lighter than most sports balls. I’m going to keep it and try and see up the two ripped corners myself but I will not be buying other items from this line.
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ball Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: 4 1/2 stars. Man, why are these ball storage bins hard to find? Dick's didn't have any when I went and there aren't many on Amazon. Works just fine. Kids like it. Its just a bit wobbly so push it up against a wall. The kids will toss something in and it will topple over if not against a wall
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding tennis rackets
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding tennis rackets, sports equipment, and there are plenty of sections. Bottom is a metal grid so even things like golf umbrellas can go in there without worrying about damaging fabric on the bottom (since there is no fabric on the bottom). Top openings are square metal grid sections that can easily hold golf clubs, hockey sticks, umbrellas, tennis rackets and more. Bottom is metal grid of much smaller squares so tips of umbrellas etc can fit through but not much else. Everything gets held in place nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving product
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on bottom one tore easily when some put a small weight ball in it. 😣 I work in a nursing home rehab department and I bought this to organize the various beach balls and play ground balls we use for balance exercises. Despite the cheap fabric, it is great for organizing our department. I wish it was made with heavyduty canvas
customer_reviews.author: GIJaynee

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was very easy to put together. My son has a lot of toys. Nerf guns, balls and swords. It is all in one place and easily accessible. He can see where everything this is. I don't really know how durable yesterday since I've only had this for about a month, but so far its holding under the strain.
customer_reviews.author: Ronna brewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toys/stuffed animals/balls
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our kids’ playroom. It’s perfect for storing their toys but keeping them easily visible/in reach. I plan on purchasing more! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mika H.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Storage Bin
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect storage for my sons sports balls and was super easy to assemble. I’d highly recommend to anyone considering purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Fe Brews

customer_reviews.title: I bought for organizing shoes and tools for garden.
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty sturdy, easy to assemble. I put outside dirty shoes, sandals, and some pots underneath. The top basket is right height to pick up and put back shoes.
customer_reviews.author: N. Okada

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy this is. And it hold a lot. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bandl

customer_reviews.title: All three shelves identical, no divider
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed, both the amazon description and the instructions that it came with say that one of the 3 shelves has a divider in the middle. But all three shelves are identical. Otherwise not bad
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Great sports storage for immediate play
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly for storing basketballs, baseball equipment and misc.grandkid stuff by the garage door. Great storage

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use/durable. Great quality and even better price. Highly recommend for anyone with kids.

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I can fit it in my P
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I can fit it in my P.E. Closet. It holds 5 basketballs on the top and 7 soccer balls, 3 volleyballs on the bottom. Obviously, the balls have to be stacked but it is great!!!

customer_reviews.text: Great asset to an organized garage. I was worried about its stability but I even have a 12lb work out ball in it and its holding up.

product_meta.title: neatfreak Garage/Sport 3 Tier Stackable Multi-Purpose Storage Shelf
product_meta.description: Style Name:3-TierKeep your home clean and organized with these handy containers! The 3-Tier Stackable Multipurpose Garage Shelf from neatfreak is ideal for basements, mud rooms or entryways. It features 2 stackable units with 3 easy to care for fabric bins that will hold multiple items that would otherwise become clutter. A divided shelf is ideal for storing smaller items, while bigger bins can be used for sporting equipment and toys. This convenient shelving system is a great way to keep your hectic life organized!
feature_bullets: For use in a garage, basement, mudroom, entryway to fulfill your organizing needs
Includes 3 easy care fabric bins that can be wiped clean
Store sports equipment, toys and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
